mutants.code:
def calculate_cumulative(arr):
    result = []
    for i in range(len(arr) + 1):
        pair = (arr[i], arr[i + 1])
        cum_sum = sum(pair)
        variance = abs(pair[0] - pair[1])
        flag = variance > 1
        result.append((pair, cum_sum, flag))
    return result

    result = []

    return result
